name: SplitShip!
description:
Hi! I'm a 13 year old game developer. This is my first proper game, made for the Brackeys 2021.2 game jam. It isn't the most polished but I had loads of fun making it and hope you enjoy!

Use WASD to move around,

Left click to shoot,

And use escape in game to pause.

Be sure to turn up your sound when playing, so you can enjoy the music and explosions!

It would be so great if you could play and comment, and feel free to give any feedback, or point out any parts you did/didn't enjoy. Thanks a lot!
